2007.name: Unknown
2007.message:
Unable to connect to the Internet.

The network may be experiencing high
volumes of traffic. Please try again later.

If this problem persists, please check
to see if you can connect to the Internet
using a PC or other device with the
same settings.
2007.short_solution: Make sure your console is in range of your Wi-Fi network, and check the settings are correct. Make sure the 'Default' connection in Internet Settings is set correctly.
